transcription: The International Arts of Europe for Quality and Technology 2015 took place at the Intercontinental Convention Hall of Frankfurt, Germany. Delegations from 53 countries and award winners featured  major players in top sectors from around the world. Leaders, entrepreneurs, managers and members of the diplomatic corps were present at the International BID Quality Convention in Frankfurt. Recognition was expressed for quality achieved through management, teamwork and attention to the communities where these companies and organizations...  and Mr. Yawuz Koya, the Vice Chairman. International Turkish Hope School from Bangladesh. This company is receiving tonight here in Frankfurt in 2015 the International Art of Europe Award of BID, Bit Group One Business Initiative Directions. International Turkish Hope School from Bangladesh. Congratulations to the Chairman, Mr. Bedretin Suatta, and the Vice Chairman, Mr. Yawuz Koya.  representing International Turkish Hope School from Bangladesh.
